name: Alphabets Lite
description:
Alphabets

Check out the Exclusive Game Video Trailer

http://goo.gl/P9Ba9

This application is designed with complete set of alphabets ranging from A-Z. Your toddler will get an unique experience and quickly jumpstart to learn alphabets.

It’s not just an introduction to alphabets but, it also teaches the word associated with an alphabet. You child can learn alphabets very quickly through this easy to use app.

The narrative for each action is studio recorded and crisp and clear.

Feature:

•Complete set of Alphabets

•Appealing graphics for young minds

•Makes learning a fun

•Extremely simple navigation and controls
